data.title: The Beer Finder + Locator
data.meta_description: Ever need to know where the closest place to purchase your favorite New Realm beers is located? Curious to see if we're in your market?
data.text:
Atlanta, GA

Explore our grounds in Atlanta's Old Fourth Ward along the Eastside Beltline Trail from the Beer Garden to the Barrel Room and then take in our Rooftop views. Wherever you choose, pull up a seat and reach for a glass - there are new brewing realms to explore.

Tap List

Food Menu

Takeout Orders

Delivery Orders

Reservations

Music & Events

Private Events

Gift Cards

Auburn, AL

We've got a stylish taproom with the freshest beer on campus, occasional live music, and a dog-friendly outdoor patio just waiting for you to come by and have a beer.

Tap List

Music & Events

Gift Cards

Charleston, SC

Located just outside of Charleston on lovely Daniel Island, NRBC features an immense outdoor patio, stages built for incredible live music inside and out, and an incredible selection of flavors from the wood-fired kitchen and from our 27 taps.

Greenville, SC

New Realm Greenville is located at the iconic Cigar Warehouse at 912 S. Main, and its focus is on barrel-aging and blending our beautiful beers into something wholly unique.

Private Events

Gift Cards

Virginia Beach, VA

Wander our sprawling grounds from the vast 2-acre Beer Garden to the intimate Taproom and then take a seat around the fire. Wherever you choose, pull up a seat and reach for a glass - there are new brewing realms to explore.
